title: unable to create new dataset with 'rev-create'
body:
I was following the demo in the cbbs imaging docs for creating a new dataset and did the following:

% datalad rev-create my_raw_dataset
datalad: Unknown command 'rev-create'.

I created a virtual environment using virtualenv and installed datalad with pip.  I'm using datalad version 0.11.4 (`datalad wtf` output attached)

On the datalad website (https://www.datalad.org/for/lazy-folks) and the cbbs imaging docs (http://imaging-docs.cbbs.eu/datamanagement/study_setup/), 'datalad rev-create' is used to create a new dataset. However, docs.datalad.org says 'datalad create' is used to create a dataset, and indeed that allowed me to successfully create the dataset.

Perhaps this is just a matter of updating the information on the datalad website and cbbs imaging docs (or datalad docs), but I wanted to bring the conflicting information to your attention.

% datalad wtf
